item.description:
All the good BBQ stuff plus watch fireworks from comfort of semi private yard in Somerville (2m from the Esplanade) how bad can that be? FIreworks start 1030. BBQ starts when you put your meat on the grill. There will be a theist or two. If you identify them be sure to hassle them.

approx location is prospect hill near union sq somerville, 0.8 miles to sullivan station. 1.5miles to central and porter st. various buses on somerville av and washington st. there will be a few spots for early birds after that it will be tougher but i think its ok to park at citizens bank lot on elm st and stone st down the hill.

pls email rgat @ rcn com for directions.

looking fwd to see you!
item.name: July 4 BBQ & Fireworks
